title: Intro to Bioinformatics
description: Students will be introduced to the field of bioinformatics, an interdisciplinary field that combines computer science, statistics, machine learning and mathematics to analyze biological data.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
